description.full: The search-panel contains the kui-fulltext-search and the kui-extended-search components.
description.summary: The search-panel contains the kui-fulltext-search and the kui-extended-search components.

description.full: Route to navigate after search. This route path should contain a component for search results.
description.summary: Route to navigate after search. This route path should contain a component for search results.

description.full: projectfilter: if true it shows the selection of projects to filter by one of them
description.summary: projectfilter: if true it shows the selection of projects to filter by one of them

description.full: If your full-text search should be filtered by one project, you can define it with project iri in the parameter filterbyproject.
description.summary: If your full-text search should be filtered by one project, you can define it with project iri in the parameter filterbyproject.

description.full: Show or hide the extended search menu
description.summary: Show or hide the extended search menu
